title: The League client update alpha starts now

replies.body:
I was one of the few starting testers! Holy 
BTW this looks AMAZING{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

I would just like to say that this new client looks great so far! Seriously, hextech rocks!
The only issue I have had between work to look at this is the inability to resize the client. Just looks a little fuzzy on my end and a simple resize might fix that.

Otherwise, love the look and feel of it, keep up the great work! Will notify you of any bugs I encounter.
